entry.title: The Northern Ireland (Emergency Provisions) Act 1987 (Commencement No.1) Order 1987
The Rate Limitation (Designation of Authorities) (Exemption) (Wales) (No. 2) Order 1987
The Folkestone-Honiton Trunk Road (Dittons-Pevensey Section De-Trunking) Order 1987
The Video Recordings Act 1984 (Scotland) (Commencement No.5) Order 1987
entry.summary: This Order brings sections 9 and 10 of the Video Recordings Act 1984 into force in Scotland for certain purposes on 1st September 1987. The sections are brought into force in England, Wales and Northern Ireland on the same day and for the same purposes by the Video Recordings Act 1984 (Commencement No. 5) Order 1987 (S.I. 1987/1142).

entry.title: The Plaice and Saithe (Specified Sea Areas) (Prohibition of Fishing) Order 1987
The Coal Industry Social Welfare Organisation (Amendment of Memorandum and Articles) Order 1987
entry.summary: This Order amends the Memorandum and Articles of Association of the limited company known as the Coal Industry Social Welfare Organisation and deems two resolutions to be passed by the company.

entry.title: The Folkestoneâ€”Honiton Trunk Road (A27 Pevensey Bypass and Slip Road) Order 1987

The Mineworkers' Pension Scheme Order 1987
entry.summary: This Order amends the Mineworkers' Pension Scheme established by the British Coal Corporation under section 37 of the Coal Industry Nationalisation Act 1946 to provide for the Union of Democratic Mineworkers to participate in the administration of the Scheme in addition to the National Union of Mineworkers.

entry.title: The Commonwealth Development Corporation (Additional Enterprises) Order 1987

The Transport Act 1985 (Commencement No.7) Order 1987
entry.summary: This Order brings into force the provisions of the Transport Act 1985 not already in force, except for the repeal of certain words in section 37 of the Town Police Clauses Act 1847. The provisions brought into force are:

entry.title: The Minibus and Other Section 19 Permit Buses Regulations 1987
entry.summary: These Regulations relate to vehicles used under permits issued under section 19 of the Transport Act 1985. The Regulations make provision regarding â€”

entry.title: The Section 19 Minibus (Designated Bodies) Order 1987
entry.summary: By this Order, the Secretary of State for Transport designates the bodies which may grant permits in relation to the use of small buses under section 19 of the Transport Act 1985 (article 3(1) and Schedule). It replaces the Minibus (Designated Bodies) Order 1980 (S.I. 1980/1356) which had effect by virtue of section 42 of the Public Passenger Vehicles Act 1981 (c. 14). That order has lapsed with the repeal of that section by Schedule 8 of the Transport Act 1985 (Transport Act 1985 (Commencement No. 7) Order 1987, S.I. 1987/1228). Traffic commissioners may grant similar permits. A designated body may grant a permit to itself and to the bodies specified in relation to it in the Schedule (article 3(2)). Article 4 requires each designated body to make returns in respect of permits granted by it.
